title: Revenue earned from sports merchandise worldwide 2006 to 2015
yAxis: Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 5 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2015 to 2011.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2008 to 2006.
Likewise, the next significant trend is extremely negative which exists from 2011 to 2010.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2010 to 2009.
Similarly, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2009 to 2008.
gold: This graph depicts the total revenue generated worldwide from sports merchandising rights from 2006 to 2010 and corresponding revenue forecasts for the years 2011 to 2015 . In 2006 , total revenues from merchandising were 19.43 billion U.S. dollars .
